channel.title: Deleting a Shop 317 PI
channel.description: I was wanting to know how i could remove a npc from my server like a shop npc. P.S. I don't just mean the stuff inside the shop i mean the entire npc.

item.title: Deleting a Shop 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“suppyscape, post:2, topic:403192”]well, in the source I use there is a folder named autospawn.cfg

(If you’ve never opened it, just click on it and click “open with another program>notepad”)

That has the npc id, and the coordinate they are in.

Should look like this.

just search the coordinates the NPC is at, and delete the line.[/quote]
Thank you for your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Deleting a Shop 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @suppyscape suppyscape
item.description:
@suppyscape wrote:

well, in the source I use there is a folder named autospawn.cfg

(If you’ve never opened it, just click on it and click “open with another program>notepad”)

That has the npc id, and the coordinate they are in.

Should look like this.

just search the coordinates the NPC is at, and delete the line.
